subject: Golf
United States Women's Open (Golf)
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: The 17-year-old golfer Lydia Ko is working with Mike Cowan, who has caddied for Tiger Woods and Jim Furyk, as she seeks her first United States Open title this weekend.
snippet: The 17-year-old golfer Lydia Ko is working with Mike Cowan, who has caddied for Tiger Woods and Jim Furyk, as she seeks her first United States Open title this weekend.
